pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used to trade with a $(l:misc/villagers#agent_villager)Stomach Inc. Agent$(/l)$(br2)The villager inside can be released by using certain weapons, including:$(li)$(l:gavv/arsenal/gavvgablade)Gavvgablade$(/l)$(li)$(l:gavv/arsenal/gavvwhipir)Gavvwhipir$(/l)$(li)$(l:gavv/arsenal/valenbuster)Valenbuster$(/l)$(li)$(l:gavv/arsenal/vrambreaker)Vrambreaker$(/l)
